Machine Intelligence and Self-Driving Vehicles


A Meetup Series hosted by Mercedes-Benz, Bosch and Otto

6th February 2017 - 7pm

Registration opens soon!

About the meetup

Self-driving intelligence

Explore and discuss state-of-the-art research in order to accelerate Machine Learning for Self-Driving Vehicles.

Open minded community

Create an open minded community for self-driving vehicle researchers.

Attend and be inspired

We strive to engage researchers, engineers and decision makers in a constructive dialogue about self-driving technology, machine intelligence and its symbiosis.
